description: Urgent need to make amends triggered by rapidly rising guilt
actor_description: I can't leave it like this. I need to make it right—say it clearly, do something concrete. I start to speak, stop, and try again—like my mouth is searching for the honest words. A knot tightens under my ribs until I act.
description_text: {actor} hovers with an apologetic intensity, as if they're about to admit fault or offer help.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear hesitant false starts—'I...' then silence, then another attempt.
